title: Gregg Lemkau on How Investment Banking has Changed in his 28 Years at Goldman Sachs
description: Gregg Lemkau, co-head of the Investment Banking Division, reflects on how the industry and the firm have changed – and stayed the same – since he joined Goldman Sachs in 1992.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: Gregg Lemkau, co-head of the Investment Banking Division, reflects on how the industry and the firm have changed – and stayed the same – since he joined Goldman Sachs in 1992.
